mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_no , board_no , mem_no , reply_content ) values(seq_reply.nextval,#{board_no},#{mem_no},#{reply_content})
mapper.select: select reply_no , board_no , mem_no , reply_content , reply_date , reply_updatedate from reply where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{reply_content} , reply_updatedate = sysdate where reply_no = #{reply_no}
